alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 17 at 2:01PM AKDT until March 21 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
